H0.text: how many lines of symmetry are there in a equilateral triangle. 1

H2.text: how many lines of symmetry are there in a equilateral triangle. 4

H3.text: how many lines of symmetry are there in a equilateral triangle. 3

A4.text: When the equilateral triangle is flipped across its altitude or rotated around its center for one-third of a full turn, its appearance is unchanged; it has the symmetry of a dihedral group D3 of order six.
